LYRIC THEATRE

“The POWU' of Sleep,” Edison.
”The Sheriff’s Child," Essanay.
“The Boomerang,” Kalcm.

MARCH 17th

 

 

MONDAY,

 

m!}wWWMD! AW

UNIVERSITY 0F 10sz

“Your Own State's University Glee Club."
f/N

(llGrinnell men and women hear the
Grinnell Glee Club every year. Would
it not be interesting to hear the State
University Glee Club this year—as a
matter of comparison as well as a
matter of enjoyment.

“ 23%.-
(llRoscoe Patch as reader will fasci-
nate you. A Cumnock graduate and

an experienced entertainer, he is a
world of fun in himself.

COLONIAL THEATRE

March 20- THURSDAY-March 20
ADMISSION 50 CENTS

Remember the Evening and Save it for the Glee Club.
Come after the Class Basket Ball Game.
